basic_info.description: Software Engineer with 3 years of experience in backend and frontend development, as well as quality assurance and security. Proficient in Java, RESTful APIs, and SQL for developing scalable backend systems. Experienced in building responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Skilled in test automation with Selenium and Postman, and committed to writing clean, maintainable code. Knowledgeable in secure coding practices to safeguard applications and ensure data protection.

descriptions: Designed and developed a secure digital locker using HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, and SQL, enabling encrypted storage of sensitive data for family access after a user's demise. Implemented AES-256 encryption for confidentiality and built modules for login, dashboard, and data forms. Created UI/UX flow in Figma and conducted performance analysis comparing DES, 3DES, and AES algorithms.

Built an NLP-based Python application using SpaCy and Transformers to classify customer reviews. Applied text pre-processing, vectorization, and statistical modeling for brand sentiment scores and visualized insights and category sentiment drift using Matplotlib and Seaborn.

Developed SafeHouse24, a secure digital vault web application using Java Servlets, HTML/CSS, and MySQL, featuring OTP-based authentication, encrypted vault access, and file/password storage. Integrated a support chatbot for real-time user assistance. Ensured strong data protection with SHA-256 hashing, input validation, and session management. Deployed and tested on Apache Tomcat with SMTP integration for email verification.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

certifications: Introduction to Cybersecurity Tools & Cyber Attacks
